Recruiting Recruiters: Contract Recruiters, Sourcers, Coordinators, Corporate Recruiters, Director's of Recruiting, Vice President's of Recruiting, HR Pro's  (both perm and contract).FlexedHire staffs Contract Recruiters at organizations who's hiring needs fluctuate. When staffing needs are high, companies can bring in a FlexedHire Contract Recruiter to handle demand for multiple requisitions. When staffing needs are accomplished, companies can have a clean break. This gives business owners and HR more time back, meets workforce flow, provides a sole source staffing function, reduces employment costs, and helps maintain proper budget control. It's true staffing flexibility at its best. 07/2017- To date have worked with clients who have cumulatively raised $2,063,000.000 in venture funding.

- Report to the CEO.- Recruit for all roles (Tech, G&A, GTM, Sales)- Joined the organization pre- product launch, and have been responsible for building out the talent acquisition function from scratch. - Sourced, recruited, vetted, and hired over 450 employees within a 7 year span across the country.- Oversee headcount planning and position prioritization for every department.- Work with executive management in strategic design and implementation of compensation programs, including incentive plans and equity. - Ensure that recruiting and sourcing strategies consistently attract and retain top talent in the markets at all levels. - Develop and maintain a complete understanding of the competitive talent marketplace.- Establish sufficient talent pipelines in high priority areas, and build effective plans to support short and long-term recruiting efforts. Positions Recruited For: Sales, Marketing, AdOps, Account Support, Marketing, Product Marketing, Product Managers, Front End, Back End, Full Stack, DevOps, QA, Accounting, Finance, HR, etc.Integrate's cloud-based marketing platform empowers marketers to more effectively acquire prospects and customers by integrating media programs and prospect data with existing marketing and sales systems. The closed-loop platform provides tools including workflow automation, data governance, analytics and a high-quality media partner marketplace, all accessed from a single, intuitive dashboard. Integrate's solution efficiently fuels marketing systems with prospects and actionable data and closes the loop to increase performance and measure ROI. Serving more than 2,500 customers and 3,500 media partners, Integrate is backed by Comcast Ventures, Liberty Global Ventures and Foundry Group.

Companies harness the Radius Revenue Platform, powered by The Network of Record, that uniquely combines intelligence with the only source for always-on B2B data allowing you to find, engage, and convert buyers with more predictability and scale than ever before.Radius connects to your company’s CRM and marketing applications to provide unlimited access to quality, always-on B2B data and intelligence. The Network of Record is fueled by a network-effect driven model with data contributions from hundreds of customers as well as a rich, foundational Business Graph. This combination delivers unparalleled accuracy and breadth in account and contact data.We have raised over $100MM in Venture Funding from top tier investors such as Salesforce Ventures, Founders Fund, Formation 8VC, BlueRun Ventures, and American Express. Our team comprises of over 150+ people, we're growing fast and I'M HIRING! To learn more visit us at https://radius.com/careers/
RHI is the world's largest specialized staffing firm. Recruited and staffed top Accounting/Finance/Mortgage/IT talent.
